response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and significance, I understand it might be a significant investment for you. However, considering the exceptional quality and potential return on your investment, I am extending an offer to acquire this product for $750,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also allowing me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
